summary: 12-year-old Pelle is bitten by an ant and develops superpowers. Aided by comic book nerd Wilhelm, Pelle creates a secret identity as superhero Antboy. When a super villain The Flea enters the scene, Antboy must step up to the challenge.
cast: Oscar Dietz|Amalie Kruse Jensen|Samuel Ting Graf|Nicolas Bro|Cecilie Alstrup Tarp|Marcuz Jess Petersen|Johannes Jeffries Sørensen|Lærke Winther|Frank Thiel|Thomas Voss|Caspar Phillipson|Nicoline Melbye Andreassen|Jonas Schmidt|Nanna Schaumburg-Muller|Aske Bang|Jakob B. keywords: close up of eyes|first part|non comic book superhero|comic book|superhero
title: Antboy. El pequeño gran superhéroe
